title: Interpretation of uncle in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the Divine in a dream: Dreams and visions come at night to include among their events many symbols and signs that carry specific connotations and meanings for the dreamer, and although the dream does not exceed several minutes during the hours of sleep, it is possible to see during its duration events equal to all the years of your life, Therefore, we find that many people try to interpret their dreams to find out the events that they remember in their real lives or imagine them based on emptying the subconscious, and through the lines of this article we will learn about the general interpretation. Interpretation of the uncle in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The uncle in real life represents security and stability, because he is a brother to the father and brother. And who will support the family if the father dies, God forbid, so the scholar Ibn Sirin showed that seeing an uncle in a dream. His body is good and clean, his clothes are elegant, not torn or dirty, and his back needs a satisfied face and smile, as it is a sign of security in the dreamer’s life, and his sufficiency is the misfortunes of immortality and immortality. Time problems. However, if the uncle comes in a dream with a sullen face and sullen features, wears worn, dirty and torn clothes, and repeats obscene and obscene words, then this vision is a warning that the dreamer will be exposed to it. Worries, crises, and misfortunes, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an uncle in a single woman’s dream: The uncle represents a great position in the life of the brother’s nieces, especially the unmarried girl, as he has a special place in her heart. He is considered her second father and she is always very close to him and takes his opinion and advice in everything. Actions. If a girl sees in her dream that she is marrying her uncle, this is evidence of the strength of her relationship to the point that she wants to marry someone similar in appearance and nature. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her uncle gave her a gift such as a bracelet or a watch, this is a sign of the person’s closeness and arrival. Good news for her, such as engagement or marriage soon. Machine. . Ready. Also, if a girl sees herself eating with her uncle, then she will marry a good man whom her husband loves and accepts. Interpretation of seeing an uncle in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees her uncle visiting her house, then she is pregnant in the same year in which she saw God, just as the married woman saw her uncle Playing with her daughter in a dream. This is evidence of the abundance of food and goodness, and that he helps the poor and needy with this abundant money. Interpretation of seeing an uncle in a dream for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman’s dream of her uncle indicates the long life of that uncle and the presence of goodness and blessing in her life and overall livelihood, and if she sees that her uncle is accompanied by her husband, this is a sign that he He will give it. . . The birth of a boy, God willing. A pregnant woman seeing her uncle in a dream indicates the ease of giving birth, the ease of childbirth, and the health of her fetus. However, if a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is quarreling or quarreling with her uncle, then she will do so. I don't care about him. Her health and neglecting her duties towards her husband. Interpretation of seeing an uncle in a dream for a man: A man seeing his uncle in a dream indicates that he will involve his wife in working at home and it could also be a sign of solving his work problems and achieving great success in the practical and professional field. Whereas

title: Interpretation of seeing a brown horse in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing brown horses in a dream for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Horses are one of the most authentic, strong and confident animals. It appears frequently in men because it reflects many of their qualities and ways of dealing with life’s difficulties. It also appears to women in their dreams during transitional periods in their lives, or periods in which they await many important events that will affect life. The fate of their lives, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing brown horses in a dream for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a brown horse in a dream for a single woman. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a brown horse in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the presence of someone who wants to He proposes to her. If an unmarried girl sees brown horses in her dream, this is a good vision that promises her that she will achieve great excellence and success in her studies if she is a student, and she will get a promotion at work if she is working. At a job. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is riding a brown horse, this is a sign of her marriage to a man who has power, influence, and high status among people. This vision also indicates the approaching date of her engagement to a young man. Morals and religion. Seeing brown horses in an unmarried girl’s dream It indicates optimism and psychological comfort, as well as the achievement of desires and goals. In general, seeing brown horses in a dream means that an unmarried girl has many good and praiseworthy effects, but if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her horse is bruised or beaten, then the vision is praiseworthy. And it indicates the emergence of problems and sadness in her life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a brown horse chasing me for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that a brown horse is chasing her, this indicates that there is someone who is determined to marry her and seeks to marry her. This vision can indicate To many successes that the dreamer will achieve in his life in a very short period of time. Interpretation of a dream about seeing fear of a brown horse in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing fear of a brown horse in a single girl’s dream is an unpleasant vision, which indicates the unstable psychological state of the owner. The dream. Also, seeing the fear of a raging brown horse in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is committing many sins and transgressions, and this dream carries a warning of the need to repent and return to God Almighty. The horse can appear in a dream differently from its natural state, and in real life This dream raises fear in the dreamer, and the horse can cause harm to the dreamer, and in this case the dream can bring unexpected interpretations.

title: Interpretation of seeing a black and white goat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a goat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a goat in a dream as symbolizing impulsiveness, ignorance, and haste, as seeing a goat in a dream indicates a woman’s weakness. Interpretation of seeing a black and white goat in a dream: Whoever sees a white goat in a dream, this dream indicates success and excellence in the field. Work. Scientists have also indicated that seeing a white goat in a dream indicates a strong will and ambition. A black goat in a dream is a sign of entering into a financial crisis and many difficulties. A married person who sees a black goat in a dream indicates a marital dispute that the opinion is going through. The man indicates A single man who sees a black goat in a dream refers to a hypocritical person. Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered goat in a dream: A man who sees in a dream that he is slaughtering a goat, and this indicates that his wife will become pregnant soon, God willing. And whoever sees that he is slaughtering a goat in a dream and eating its meat, this indicates a great profit and benefits that he will get soon. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream indicates marriage to a maid. And seeing goat blood in a dream, this means sustenance and saving money. Goat skin in a dream is a sign of the blessing of diet. Whoever sees in a dream that he is playing with goats in a dream, this indicates money and women. Interpretation of a vision A goat in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that a goat is being beaten, this indicates a quarrel between the dreamer and a dear friend. If you see yourself hitting a goat in a dream, this may indicate that a friend is angry with the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a goat for a single woman: An unmarried woman who sees a goat in a dream It shows the weakness of her character, and that he is stubborn in the affairs of his life. There are those who interpreted the vision as indicating an arrogant, petty friend. And seeing a goat for a person indicates a fiancé who has no ambitions and does not try to achieve his goals. Interpretation of a dream about a married goat: A married woman who sees a goat in a dream indicates that she is passing through During a period of fatigue and effort. For a married man, goats indicate kindness and love between married couples. There are those who interpreted the vision of goats for a married man as indicating that the husband is short-lived, talks a lot, and benefits his family. Interpretation of seeing goats for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman dreams of goats, so this dream indicates that the birth of a male It may indicate an imminent date of birth. Seeing a goat in a dream for a pregnant woman is good and abundant for her. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing a goat in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we receive your comments at the end of the article and we will give you the interpretation as soon as possible. Available time.

title: Read Ibn Sirin's interpretations of seeing a severed hand in a dream

preview.html: Cutting off a hand in a dream: The dream of cutting off a hand is considered one of the frightening dreams that cause anxiety and fear for many people, and seeing a hand in general in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s relationship with the people around him and the degree of his connection with them. Hence, many searches for the interpretation of this dream, which varies from one dreamer to another according to the details he saw in the dream. What is the interpretation of cutting off a hand in a dream? Seeing a hand in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s relationship with people and communication between them, and seeing the right hand shows masculine qualities, while The left hand also shows feminine qualities and kindness. As for seeing a large hand in a dream, it is a sign of success and the fulfillment of desires, and seeing it full of blood and stained with it is an indication of the dreamer’s feeling of guilt that he committed in reality. When you see a severed hand, it is a sign of separation between people and loved ones, or separation between the spouse. And his wife, or the fiancé and his fiancée, and the dream of cutting off the hand from behind is a sign of disobedience. And corruption and committing sins. Seeing the left hand cut off in a dream for an official or ruler is a sign of the death of his sister or the death of his brother. Holding a married woman’s hand is a sign of the end of worries, problems, and sorrows. As for seeing a short hand in a dream, it means that her life will be short, and a kiss on the hand A sign of hiding. The dreamer in reality. If a married woman sees that she is holding the hand of a man she does not know and that he is a stranger to her, this may be a sign that she is breaking a taboo and this vision serves as a reminder to return to God - the Almighty - and follow His commandments and avoid His prohibitions. The appearance of a lot of hair on the hands in The dream indicates the presence of a large number of children and their success in their professional or academic lives. If an unmarried woman sees that she is holding the hand of her father or mother, this is evidence of the strength of the connection and the quality of the relationship between them. Seeing a man decorating his hand with henna indicates that he swims a lot, and in a woman’s dream A married woman is evidence of the husband’s good treatment and kindness to her. Interpretation of seeing a severed hand in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a severed hand in a dream as distress or distress affecting the brothers, and if the blood bleeds and is abundant, it is evidence of sustenance with a lot of money that benefits the dreamer and the entire family. He also said that the vision is evidence that the dreamer’s lineage will be cut off, meaning that she will give birth only to girls and not boys. If the dreamer is a woman, this is an indication that her menstrual cycle will be. Amputation. As for seeing the hand cut off from the palm of the hand, it is a sign of abundant goodness that the dreamer will soon acquire. The amputation of the arm from the shoulder is an indication that the dreamer is swearing a false oath, or an indication of stealing or abandoning prayer, and in general it is a warning to the dreamer to return to the path Right. What is the interpretation of a dream about cutting off a finger? The finger in the dream indicates siblings, children, and kinship, and when you see the fingers tightly intertwined, this indicates that the dreamer maintains the kinship connection and the strength of the relationship between him and his brothers and children, as well as an indication that she is supportive and helpful to him. As some mentioned. Interpretation scholars say that seeing the five fingers is evidence of the nearness of life

As some mentioned. Interpretation scholars say that seeing the five fingers is evidence of the nearness of life

title: What do you know about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the director in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a manager in a dream: Many of us dream that we see our manager or boss, so we feel confused and worried about what this dream holds for us. The manager is the person who leads us, and although we all fear his manager, seeing him in our dreams can be an important signal for us. Seeing a director in a dream varies according to the form of the vision, the condition of the viewer, and also the condition of the director. The screen of the director’s face in a dream indicates the coming of goodness, success, and happiness, as well as anger and frowning on his face, which indicates that the dreamer is suffering from a loss. Interpretation of seeing a director in a dream: If you see an employer in In a dream, it means that you will take responsibility and you will be good at handling it. If you shake hands with your boss at work, this is a sign that the matter is related to your profession and will lead to your advancement at work, such as getting a promotion or a raise. Whoever dreamed of his boss and he was happy, this is a sign that you are loyal In your work and that your boss is proud of you. If you see your boss guiding you in a dream, this indicates love. Seeing the boss in a dream is a sign of good news and good news for you. If you see that you are driving your boss’s car in a dream, it is good that you will soon reach your goal and achieve Your dreams and progress in life. Interpretation of a director in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin explained that seeing a director symbolizes good and evil and depends on the condition of the manager, happy or sad, as well as your relationship with him in a dream as follows: If a married woman sees herself working in a large company and the manager assigns her tasks It is difficult and she was able to accomplish it in a short time. This is a sign of her strength and ability to solve her problems and face difficulties. When a married woman sees that her manager is upset by her mistakes in completing work matters, she corrects these mistakes. This is a sign that she has a problem, but she will find the solution and get out of it. If A man saw in his dream that his manager was upset with him because of his shortcomings in his work, then this is a bad omen for the occurrence of misfortunes and problems. If a man sees in his dream that his manager is happy to accomplish many tasks in a short period of time, this indicates good management of his life and that God will grant him success. Seeing a woman A pregnant woman performs the tasks she has accomplished to perfection, and the presence and vision of her manager is evidence of her success in life. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream symbolizes her manager’s reprimand for being late in completing work in the event of failure. Interpretation of a young man seeing his manager happy with his efforts in bringing him a lot of livelihood, And great good for him. If a young man sees his manager in a dream, speaking to him with sarcasm and disrespect, this indicates his unhappiness in life. If a single woman sees in her dream that she is diligent in her work and her manager comes and increases her duties, then this act is a sign of her superiority. A dream about a director in A single woman’s dream: To see an unmarried woman in her dream whose manager appears, whether she is a secretary or an employee, and then the manager goes to have a nice conversation with her, or holds her hands, or talks to her in a nice way, all of this indicates the arrival of good news. When she sees her manager in a dream giving her a financial reward for her efforts So this

title: Interpretation of a dream about thread

preview.html: Thread is a wire made of textile fibers that is used in knitting and spinning to make clothes and more. Seeing thread in a dream certainly indicates many different associations, so if you are looking for an interpretation of seeing thread in a dream by Ibn Sirin, follow this article through which we will answer all your questions. Interpretation of seeing a thread in a dream by Ibn Sirini. Dream interpreters indicate that the thread expresses your desire to build relationships with the people you have met in a short period of time and that you will create strong relationships that will not break easily. It also shows that you are uncomfortable because of the pressures you are exposed to. Receiving, going through, or feeling pressure at work due to financial problems. Interpretation of seeing threads unraveling in a dream: This indicates that you feel comfortable and reassured, and that you are trying to recall memories of the past that make you happy, and that it is time to pay attention to your future. Interpretation of seeing red thread in a dream: This dream appears Your good luck and the presence of people next to you who support you in most adversities and find people who have common interests with you, which increases your friendship rate, and the red color symbolizes your feeling of distress and fatigue. preview.html: Interpretation of seeing eating meat in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried woman sees meat in a dream, this means that she will get married soon. Seeing meat in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign that he will take his place in professional life, God willing. If a virgin is cooking meat in a dream, this means That she will marry a man who has a lot of money and is a reputable man. Cooking meat in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of coming comfort for her, until the anxiety and pain she suffers from will go away. Buying meat in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of her reaching a position in Practical life. The previous dream may indicate stability in emotional life. Seeing uncooked meat in a dream is a warning about the presence of inappropriate companions. She must be careful and stay away from them, otherwise she may be associated with an oppressor, for God is Most High and Most Knowing. Boiling meat in a dream symbolizes that Her money will be blessed, God willing. It is believed that an unmarried girl buys meat in her dream while she is still a student. Explain the success she will achieve in academic life, thanks to God. See also: Cooking raw meat in a dream. Interpretation of watching meat consumption in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman dreams that she sees meat And she is preparing to boil it in a dream. It indicates that she is raising her children well or indicates problems that will be eliminated. When a married woman gives raw meat to her husband in a dream, this is not worthy of praise. It indicates that she will suffer from the problems that happen to her because she talks about things that are not It concerns her, and God knows best. Uncooked meat in a dream for a married woman is a sign of a problem. If a married woman buys meat in a dream, this symbolizes that she is living in marital happiness. Giving meat in a dream to her husband and not eating it while it is raw, means that he will obtain sustenance with permission. God. Cooking meat in a dream for a married woman is good for her and will come to her. Eating meat with good taste for a married woman indicates that she will become good and blue, God willing. But if a married woman eats meat with bad taste, then this dream is not beneficial for her, and she must pray and seek forgiveness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating meat for a man and its meaning. When a man sees frozen meat in a dream, this indicates the happy married life he lives with his partner and that life between them enjoys stability. Seeing uncooked meat in a dream for a man cannot be more than a warning of financial loss. The dream may be The former serves as a warning to him of the corrupt morals that he must change in order to please God Almighty. Eating grilled meat in a dream is good news at the end of difficult rulings and problems, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of seeing serving raw meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Meaning of seeing eating meat in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Vision Boiled meat in a dream for a pregnant woman is a good sign that she will have a smooth birth, God willing. Giving boiled meat in a dream to someone is a sign of money in exchange for the money she will receive. Eating raw meat

title: Interpretation of seeing cloth in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing fabric in a dream or in a dream, seeing fabric in a dream and interpretation, dream meanings for fabric, the fabric from which clothes are made and all the fabrics that a person uses in his daily life and the interpretation of seeing fabric in a dream has many connotations that scholars explain and we explain in detail through our article today on the site The vision on our website. Interpretation of seeing cloth in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing cloth in a dream indicates that the dreamer is blessed with a covering from God Almighty in his life. Seeing cloth in a dream in many colors means a lot of money. Seeing cloth in a woman’s dream indicates purity and veil. Seeing synthetic fiber fabric indicates To fake hair. Seeing cloth in a bad dream in a dream indicates that the viewer is exposed to poverty. Interpretation of seeing cloth in a dream for a single woman. Seeing cloth in a dream for a single woman indicates that he will get married soon. Seeing a white piece of cloth in a dream for unmarried women announces her superiority and success in her life. Seeing cloth in a dream for a single woman Of silk, it announces the girl’s victory in this world and the hereafter and her piety. Seeing buying cloth in a dream for an unmarried woman. Cue an engagement soon. Seeing cloth in a dream made of wool or cotton means a lot of money. Seeing colored fabrics in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates achieving goals in life. Seeing cloth The color in the bachelor’s room in a dream symbolizes her marriage to a man of wealth and position. Seeing an unmarried woman with yellow cloth in a dream indicates exposure to disease. Interpretation of seeing cloth in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman as a gift of cloth in a dream announces her religious commitment and closeness to God Almighty. Married woman Seeing her husband buying a piece of cloth in a dream for her announces the goodness and money that comes to him without effort or trouble. Seeing a married woman in a dream: white cloth shows that you will achieve what you want. Seeing a dream about cloth in a married woman’s dream indicates the end of her worries and problems. Interpretation of seeing cloth in a dream for a pregnant woman: a vision A pregnant woman wearing soft cloth in a dream indicates the safety of herself and her fetus. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream wearing a white cloth indicates an easy birth for her. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing a red cloth in a dream shows that she has given birth to a child. Interpretation of seeing cloth in a dream for a man. A man seeing a strong and soft cloth in a dream announces About his endless livelihood and the many good things he receives. Seeing a man giving cloth in a dream to his wife indicates the birth of a son. A man seeing a piece of silk cloth in a dream indicates poverty and hardship. Seeing a man wearing silk in his sleep indicates the sins, sins, and desires that he follows in his life. Interpretation of seeing cloth in a dream according to Nablus: Seeing cloth in a dream symbolizes purity, chastity, and covering. Seeing cloth in a dream that was dyed. The vision indicates the dreamer’s prosperity. Seeing cloth in a dream indicates good news and the fulfillment of desires and ambitions. Seeing cloth and cutting it in a dream indicates joy and pleasure in the dreamer’s life or

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing ducks in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Ducks in a dream have many connotations and meanings for dreamers and make them desperate to know them, and in the following article we will learn about the most important interpretations related to this topic that our distinguished scholars mentioned, so let us read the following. Ducks in a dream The dream of ducks in a dream indicates that he will get many good things in his life in the coming days as a result of his fear of God (the Most High) in all his actions. If a person sees ducks in his dream, this is a sign that he will get a very important position in his workplace, in appreciation of the great efforts he makes to develop it. If the dreamer sees ducks in his sleep, this indicates the many funds that he will collect from behind his work, which will flourish greatly. Seeing the dreamer in a dream about ducks, and he was single, symbolizes that he will find the girl who suits him and proposes to marry her immediately. Ducks in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer who sees ducks in a dream as a sign of the many changes that will occur in his life in the coming days and will be promising for him. If a person sees ducks in his dream, this is a sign that he will get things that he has been trying to implement for a long time. If the dreamer sees ducks in His sleep indicates that he has reached a high position in his work, because he has proven his value and worth. Seeing ducks in a dream symbolizes that his future partner will have many good qualities that will make him very happy in his life with her. What is the interpretation of seeing ducks in a dream for a single woman? Seeing ducks in a dream by unmarried women means a lot of sustenance that she will enjoy in her coming days, which will make her at her best. If the dreamer sees ducks in her dream, this expresses the good news that she will receive in the coming days and will make her very happy. If the dreamer sees ducks in her dream, this means that she has received a marriage proposal from a suitable person for her and will accept it immediately. The girl who sees ducks in her dream symbolizes that she will get the things she has always wanted and that will make her well-off. What is the interpretation of ducks in a dream for a married woman? If a married woman sees ducks in her dream and raises them, this is a sign of her desire to instill good values ​​​​in her children and raise them in a way that benefits them in their future lives. If the dreamer sees ducks in his dream, this means that her husband will get a very important promotion in his workplace that will improve his living conditions significantly Big. The dreamer who sees ducks in his sleep indicates that her husband loves her very much and is ready to fulfill all her wishes and do everything she dreams of. Seeing a woman cooking ducks in her dream symbolizes the happy life she was enjoying with her husband and children at that time and her wish that nothing would disturb their lives. Ducks in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream with ducks means that she will enjoy a calm and normal pregnancy period during which she will not face any difficulties. If the dreamer sees ducks in his dream, this is a sign that she will not suffer from any problems during the birth process and will enjoy seeing her child safe from

title: Interpretation of a dream about food falling on the ground in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about food falling to the ground in a dream If you want to know the interpretation of a dream about food falling to the ground in a dream, it is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to. Find out an interpretation of “For this reason we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some working scholars. Interpretation of a dream about food falling on the ground in a dream: Spoiled food falling in a dream may indicate the end of a difficult period that the dreamer was going through, and God knows best. Spoiled food may indicate Falling to the ground indicates the coming good for the dreamer and that he will be freed from worries and sorrows. A person’s dream that he threw food on the ground and the food spoiled may indicate the good that will come to him and the abundant livelihood that the dreamer will obtain during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a neighbor’s building collapsing in a dream in the event that You saw the neighbor’s building collapsing, as this may indicate a crisis that the neighbors may be exposed to during this time, and God knows best. We find that the collapse of the neighbor’s building in a dream could indicate some problems and crises that this family is suffering from, and God knows best. In the event that he sees his neighbors’ house having fallen from it The walls may indicate a financial crisis that the neighbors may be exposed to during this period. The collapse of the neighbor’s house in a dream may indicate the arrival of sorrows for the owners of the house, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about oil falling on the ground in a dream: In the event that you see oil falling on the ground, this may indicate Beyond the disturbances that occurred in the life of the dreamer during those days. Whoever dreams of oil falling to the ground may indicate that he was going through a financial crisis at that time, and God knows best. Seeing oil falling to the ground may indicate financial disturbances and crises that the dreamer may suffer from. In those days, a person’s dream that oil fell on the ground may indicate changes in his life for the worse. He must ask God for help. Interpretation of a dream about a body falling from the sky in a dream: If one sees that his body has fallen from the sky, this may indicate a problem that the dreamer fell into during this period, and God knows best. His body falling from the sky may indicate a disaster and troubles that may occur. The dreamer suffers from it on those days. In the event that one sees a body falling from the sky, this may indicate pollution and competition that occurred to the visions during this time. In the event that one sees that there is a body falling from the sky, this may indicate that some disturbances have occurred in the dreamer’s life in Those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of an old house falling in a dream: In the event that my personal opinion is that an old house has fallen and collapsed, this may indicate some problems and fears that the dreamer is suffering from in his life and that they will soon end. An old house falling in a dream may indicate the end of a period Difficult for the dreamer. A person’s dream of an old house collapsing may indicate some disturbances that occurred in his life during those days. It is possible that seeing an old house collapsing in a dream indicates abandonment of obedience and disobedience, and the dreamer must repent and approach the Blessed and Most High God.
